TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ObservableCollection`1<T> extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<!T> implements class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class ObservableCollection(Of T) Inherits Collection(Of T) Implements INotifyCollectionChanged, INotifyPropertyChanged

generic <typename T> public ref class ObservableCollection : System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<T>, System::Collections::Specialized::INotifyCollectionChanged, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged
type ObservableCollection<'T> = class inherit Collection<'T> interface INotifyCollectionChanged interface INotifyPropertyChanged

span.span: The type of elements in the collection.

summary.span: 代表在加入和移除項目時，或重新整理整份清單時提供通知的動態資料集合。

span.span: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在許多情況下您使用的資料是物件的集合。In many cases the data that you work with is a collection of objects. 例如，資料繫結中的常見案例是使用這類， ，或來顯示記錄的集合。For example, a common scenario in data binding is to use an such as a , , or to display a collection of records. 您可以列舉實作任何集合介面。You can enumerate over any collection that implements the interface. 不過，若要設定動態繫結，以便插入或刪除集合中的更新[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]自動執行，則集合必須實作介面。However, to set up dynamic bindings so that insertions or deletions in the collection update the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] automatically, the collection must implement the interface. 此介面會公開事件，應該在每次基礎集合變更時引發的事件。This interface exposes the event, an event that should be raised whenever the underlying collection changes. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供類別，這是資料集合，實作的內建實作介面。provides the class, which is a built-in implementation of a data collection that implements the interface. 在之前實作您自己的集合，請考慮使用或其中一個現有的集合類別，例如， ，和，還有其他更多。Before implementing your own collection, consider using or one of the existing collection classes, such as , , and , among many others. 如果您在進階案例，並想要實作您自己的集合，請考慮使用，以提供可依索引個別存取的物件的非泛型集合。If you have an advanced scenario and want to implement your own collection, consider using , which provides a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index. 實作與資料繫結引擎可提供最佳效能。Implementing provides the best performance with the data binding engine. > [!NOTE] > 從來源物件繫結至繫結目標傳輸的資料值的完整支援，支援可繫結的屬性集合中每個物件必須實作適當的屬性變更通知機制，例如介面。To fully support transferring data values from binding source objects to binding targets, each object in your collection that supports bindable properties must implement an appropriate property changed notification mechanism such as the interface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 繫結集合 」 中[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## 附註的 XAML 用法Notes on XAML Usage 可用來當做中的 XAML 物件項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]、 3.0 和 3.5 版中。 can be used as a XAML object element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], in versions 3.0 and 3.5. 不過，使用方式有基本的限制。However, the usage has substantial limitations. - 必須是根項目，因為`x:TypeArguments`必須用來指定受條件約束的泛型類型的屬性僅適用於物件元素的根項目。 must be the root element, because the `x:TypeArguments` attribute that must be used to specify the constrained type of the generic is only supported on the object element for the root element. - 您必須宣告`x:Class`屬性 (必須是此 XAML 檔案的建置動作的需要`Page`或某些其他組建會編譯 XAML 的動作)。You must declare an `x:Class` attribute (which entails that the build action for this XAML file must be `Page` or some other build action that compiles the XAML). - 是命名空間和組件，一開始未對應至預設 XML 命名空間中。 is in a namespace and assembly that are not initially mapped to the default XML namespace. 您必須將對應的前置詞的命名空間和組件，並用該前置詞上的物件元素標記。You must map a prefix for the namespace and assembly, and then use that prefix on the object element tag for . 若要使用較簡單的方式XAML 應用程式中的功能是衍生自您自己自訂的非泛型集合類別的宣告，並限制為特定類型。A more straightforward way to use capabilities from XAML in an application is to declare your own non-generic custom collection class that derives from , and constrains it to a specific type. 然後將對應包含這個類別的組件，並參考它，在您的 XAML 物件項目。Then map the assembly that contains this class, and reference it as an object element in your XAML.

span.span: If there was a call to of which the return value has not yet been disposed of.

exception.span: 一般而言，這表示 事件期間有變更這個集合的其他嘗試時。

span.span: Typically, this means when there are additional attempts to change this collection during a event.

exception.span: 不過，這取決於衍生類別選擇呼叫 時。

span.span: Removes all items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在清除清單時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared. 此實作會引發事件。This implementation raises the event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 方法的基底類別。For more information, see the method of the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和方法，修改此集合 raise進行此程序的事件`virtual`方法。Properties and methods that modify this collection raise the event through this `virtual` method. ## Examples 在覆寫這個方法，請呼叫基底實作，或使用方法以處理重新進入的集合變更時，如下列範例所示：When overriding this method, either call the base implementation or use the method to handle reentrant collection changes, as in the following example: [!code-csharp[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/CSharp/DataSource.cs#blockreentrancy)] [!code-vb[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/visualbasic/datasource.vb#blockreentrancy)]
